reg_info.full_title: O. Reg. 387/07: PRESCRIBED BODIES, CROWN AS EMPLOYER
reg_info.citation: O. Reg. 387/07: PRESCRIBED BODIES, CROWN AS EMPLOYER

content.content: 1. The following bodies are prescribed for the purposes of clause 1.1 (1) (b) of the Act: 1. Colleges of applied arts and technology established under the Ontario Colleges of Applied Arts and Technology Act, 2002. 2.  Revoked: O. Reg. 113/17, s. 1 (1). 3. Algonquin Forestry Authority. 4., 5.  Revoked: O. Reg. 113/17, s. 1 (2). 6. Liquor Control Board of Ontario. 7. McMichael Canadian Art Collection. 7.1 Metrolinx. 8. Metropolitan Toronto Convention Centre Corporation. 9. The Niagara Parks Commission. 9.1 Ontario Cannabis Retail Corporation. 10. Ontario Public Service Pension Board. 11.  Revoked: O. Reg. 208/11, s. 1. 12. Ottawa Convention Centre Corporation. 13. Science North. 14. Workplace Safety and Insurance Appeals Tribunal. 15. Workplace Safety and Insurance Board.  O. Reg. 387/07, s. 1; O. Reg. 208/11, s. 1; O. Reg. 113/17, s. 1; O. Reg. 32/18, s. 1.
content.raw_html:
1. The following bodies are prescribed for the purposes of clause 1.1 (1) (b) of the Act:

1. Colleges of applied arts and technology established under the Ontario Colleges of Applied Arts and Technology Act, 2002.

2. Revoked: O. Reg. 113/17, s. 1 (1).

3. Algonquin Forestry Authority.

4., 5. Revoked: O. Reg. 113/17, s. 1 (2).

6. Liquor Control Board of Ontario.

7. McMichael Canadian Art Collection.

7.1 Metrolinx.

8. Metropolitan Toronto Convention Centre Corporation.

9. The Niagara Parks Commission.

9.1 Ontario Cannabis Retail Corporation.

10. Ontario Public Service Pension Board.

11. Revoked: O. Reg. 208/11, s. 1.

12. Ottawa Convention Centre Corporation.

13. Science North.

14. Workplace Safety and Insurance Appeals Tribunal.

15. Workplace Safety and Insurance Board.  O. Reg. 387/07, s. 1; O. Reg. 208/11, s. 1; O. Reg. 113/17, s. 1; O. Reg. 32/18, s. 1.

content.content: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 387/07, s. 2.
content.raw_html: 2. Omitted (provides for coming into force of provisions of this Regulation).  O. Reg. 387/07, s. 2.
